metadata.feature_description: Analytics dashboard specifically for the Answers module showing Q&A metrics

steps.action: Navigate to PersonaBar > Dashboard > Community Analytics
steps.expected: Community Analytics panel opens with module-specific tabs
steps.actual: Community Analytics panel opened showing tabs for Answers, Blogs, Discussions, Events, Ideas, Wiki

steps.action: Verify Answers tab is displayed with Community Health section
steps.actual: Community Health section shows 7 Answers-specific metrics including: Questions older than 24 hours without Answers (0%), Questions older than 6 hours with no Views (0%), Question older than 12 hours with views but no interaction (0%), Questions with lots of comments (0%), Questions older than 24 hours with no votes (0%), Questions older than 24 hours with unaccepted answers (0%), Questions and answers with down-votes (0%)

steps.expected: Engagement metrics and graph are shown
steps.actual: Engagement section displays with line graph (Mon-Sun) and breakdown showing: Engagement 0%, Interacted 0, Formed Relationship 0, Shared 0

steps.action: Verify Creates & Views section is displayed
steps.expected: Creates and Views metrics are shown
steps.actual: Creates & Views section displays with line graph (Mon-Sun) and counters showing CREATES: 0, VIEWS: 0

steps.action: Review Community Health metrics for question resolution tracking
steps.expected: Metrics related to question resolution are displayed
steps.actual: Community Health section shows resolution-related metrics: 'Questions older than 24 hours without Answers' (0%) - tracks unresolved questions, 'Questions older than 24 hours with unaccepted answers' (0%) - tracks acceptance rates

steps.action: Verify comparative term is displayed for each metric
steps.expected: Each metric shows current value and comparative term
steps.actual: Each metric card displays the current percentage and a 'Comparative Term' row showing the comparison value (0%)

steps.action: Review quality-related metrics in Community Health section
steps.expected: Metrics related to answer quality are displayed
steps.actual: Quality metrics displayed include: 'Questions and answers with down-votes' (0%), 'Questions with lots of comments' (0%), 'Question older than 12 hours with views but no interaction' (0%)
Trending Tags section displayed with message 'No trending tags available in selected period' (no activity data)
Popular Content section displayed with message 'No popular content available in selected period' (no activity data)

steps.action: Change Comparative Term dropdown from 1 w to 1 m
steps.expected: Dropdown allows selection of different time periods
steps.actual: Successfully changed Comparative Term from '1 w' (1 week) to '1 m' (1 month), dashboard refreshed with new filter

steps.action: Click on date range to view period options
steps.actual: Period selection menu appeared with options: Day, Week, Month, Year, Custom

steps.action: Select Custom option to view date picker
steps.expected: Custom date picker opens with calendar selection
steps.actual: Custom date picker opened showing two calendars - From date (2026-02-02) and To date (2026-02-08) with month/year selectors and Apply button

observations: All metrics show 0% values because this is a test environment without Q&A activity data in the Answers module
The Analytics Warehouse dependency appears to be working - the dashboard loads and displays all expected sections
The module-specific data isolation is evident as the Answers tab shows only Answer/Q&A-related metrics (questions, answers, votes) while other modules like Blogs show blog-specific metrics
Export functionality button is present in the UI but was not tested as it requires data to export
The combined dashboard view shows all community modules (Answers, Blogs, Discussions, Events, Ideas, Wiki) side by side
